text: llh subhanah wteala wahdah daewatan altwhyd (la 'ilh 'iilaa allh), fala yuebd wala yudea 'iilaa hw, walalht alty yebdwnha min dun allah la tjyb duea' man deaha, whalhm maeaha khal etshan ymd yadah 'iilaa alma' min beyd; lysl 'iilaa fmh fala yasil 'ilyh, wama sual alkafirin laha 'iilaa ghayat fi albued ean alswab l'ishrakhm biallah ghyrh
